Cmp3\Config

Class ConfigAbstract

All Implemented Interfaces:

ConfigInterface

Direct Known Subclasses:

ConfigResource
public abstract class ConfigAbstract
implements ConfigInterface

Gives access to the applications configutration values.
In this case it's access to typoscript setup.

GetInteger

public  GetInteger(string $strConfigPath, mixed $intDefault=null, mixed $intMin=null, mixed $intMax=null)

Returns configuration value which is checked for an integer value.
If the configured value is not an integer or isn't inside the min/max range the default value will be returned.

TypoScript path like some.setup.value is possible

Parameters

$strConfigPath -
$intDefault -
$intMin -
$intMax -

GetFilename

public string GetFilename(string $strConfigPath, mixed $strDefault=null)

Returns configuration value which is expected to be a filepath.
The path will be resolved to an absolute path.

TypoScript path like some.setup.value is possible

Parameters

$strConfigPath -
$strDefault -

GetTimeSpan

public integer GetTimeSpan(string $strConfigPath, mixed $strDefault=null)

Returns configuration value which is expected to be a timespan in seconds.
It is possible to define the timespan as integer but also with a string which can be parsed with strtotime().

Examples:
1 year 4m 10h15m 10s 2 weeks 4m
TypoScript path like some.setup.value is possible

Parameters

$strConfigPath -
$strDefault -

ParseTimeSpan

protected static integer ParseTimeSpan(string $time)

Parses a string and transforms it into a time span (seconds)
y|year|years month|months w|week|weeks d|day|days h|hour|hours m|min|minute|minutes s|sec|second|seconds

Parameters

$time -

GetTimeStamp

public integer GetTimeStamp(string $strConfigPath, mixed $strDefault=null)

Returns configuration value which is expected to be a timestamp.
It is possible to define the timestamp as integer but also with a date string which can be parsed with strtotime().

Examples:
now 10 September 2000 +1 day +1 week +1 week 2 days 4 hours 2 seconds next Thursday last Monday

Parameters

$strConfigPath -
$strDefault -

GetColor

public Color GetColor(string $strConfigPath, string $strDefault='none')

Returns a color object from a string
CSS color notation is allowed
lime - predefined color name rgb(0,255,0) - RGB range 0-255
#f00 - #rgb #ff0000 - #rrggbb rgb(255,0,0) rgb(100%, 0%, 0%) rgba(0,0,255,0.5) - semi-transparent solid blue rgba(255, 50%, 0%, 0.1) - very transparent solid orange
hsl( 0, 100%, 50%) - red hsl(120, 100%, 50%) - green hsla(120, 100%, 50%, 1) - the same, with explicit opacity of 1 hsla(240, 100%, 50%, 0.5) - semi-transparent solid blue hsla(30, 100%, 50%, 0.1) - very transparent solid orange
TypoScript path like some.setup.value is possible

Parameters

$strConfigPath -
$strDefault -

isEnabled

public boolean isEnabled(string $strConfigPath, mixed $strDefault=null)

Check a config value if its enabled Anything except '' and 0 is true If the option is not set the default value will be returned

Description Copied From interface:
